long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension for Youtube, specifically Youtube Streams, designed to filter out low quality stream chat. The affect is noticeable, and almost jarring, when watching larger streamers.

Current features:
* Hides non-member messages
* Hides all messages with >30% capital letters
* Hides messages that contain only emojis

Developer: https://twitter.com/arm64e
Source Code: https://github.com/KritantaDev/YTSaneChat

Submit feedback, issues, requests:
